body_html:
Hello @Nayana-ibm
It looks like we just need to add a config option here for s390x:
https://github.com/google/nsync/blob/master/BUILD#L29
And add the necessary copts options for the architecture.
I confirmed with @m3bm3b that nsync, unlike boringssl is meant to be compatible and should work on s390x.

One detail is, We only accept changes to nsync internally.
If you can create a patch to support s390x, we can apply it internally and push the changes outside.

body:
Hello @Nayana-ibm 
It looks like we just need to add a config option here for s390x:
https://github.com/google/nsync/blob/master/BUILD#L29
And add the necessary copts options for the architecture.
I confirmed with @m3bm3b that nsync, unlike boringssl is meant to be compatible and should work on s390x.

One detail is, We only accept changes to nsync internally.
If you can create a patch to support s390x, we can apply it internally and push the changes outside.
